definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_wakes_up</field><next><block type="entity_set_foodlevel"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="foodlevel"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">9</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Coffee</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Rise and shine!</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">SLOWNESS</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1200</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">BLINDNESS</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1200</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
